StartMessage:
Hi there! I'm here to help you purchase your car insurance quickly and easily.

To get started, please send us the following documents:
📄 A photo of your passport
🚙 A photo of your vehicle identification document (technical passport)

Once we receive these, we’ll guide you through the next steps! 😊
IncorrectPhotosMessage: Sorry, but the photos you sent are not clear enough, or in incorrect order. Please make sure they are well-lit and correct order (first your passport, second technical passport).
PhotosShouldBeInOneMessage: Please send the photos in one message and in correct order (first your passport, second technical passport).
